name: UpdateChangeNote
description:
Update an existing note on a Freshservice change request.

Use this tool to modify an existing note on a specific change request in Freshservice by providing the change and note IDs.

parameters.name: change_request_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the change request to be updated.

parameters.name: note_id
parameters.description: The ID of the existing note to be updated. Provide the unique integer identifier for the note.

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific note to be updated.

parameters.name: user_id_of_note_creator
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who originally created the note. Used to identify the note's author.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_email_addresses
parameters.description: Email addresses to notify about the updated note. Provide as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_body_html
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format. Use HTML tags to style the content appropriately.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_body_text
parameters.description: The content of the note in plain text format to be updated.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_creation_time
parameters.description: Date and time when the note was created; format should follow ISO 8601 standard.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_updated_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was last updated. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notify_emails
parameters.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was created

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
